page.title: 05A child's life in Fauldhouse
page.content: But if he doesn't break through however ,the team that he didn't get through gets him. We go on playing that until the bell rings.When it does, we count how many people we have and then see who has the most people and the team with most wins. Dinnertime comes after doing work like maths or First Aid in English, which come after playtime. After dinnertime , which lasts for an hour, we go back to work with something like project. We go on with project until 3.00 then we start to tidy up. We go home at 3.20. I then go a few errands or help to tidy the house. If there is enough time after that I can either go out to play or stay in to watch {T.V.}I have dinner at 5.00 and play or stay in to discuss our day at work.{
